casebody.data:
JONES v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. November 23, 1922.) No. 3931. William C. Douglas and Claud J. Carter, both of San Antonio, Tex. (Douglas, Carter & Childers, of San Antonio, Tex., on the brief), for plaintiff in error. John D. Hartman, U. S. Atty., and W.'C. Williams, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of San Antonio, Tex.

Before WALKER, BRXAN and KING, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
